Campus Shuttle

Description:

The Campus Shuttle travels around campus making stops at all Residential communities as well as the Engineering Building, Decker Health Services, the East and West Gyms, the Events Center, Clearview, and Academic A.

Operation Time:

Weekdays:
The Campus Shuttle runs in continuous loops on a Green Shuttle from 7:00 A.M. to 9:40 P.M. After, the Campus Shuttle will operate in a Blue Bus performing singular, non-continous scheduled loops beginning from the Mohawk stop at 10:10 P.M, 10:35 P.M., and 11:30 P.M..


Weekends:
The Campus Shuttle runs in a singular, non-continuous, scheduled loop on a Blue Bus during Weekends from 8:45 A.M. to 11:30 P.M..


Friday and Saturday Late Nites:
The Campus Shuttle runs in a singular, non-continuous, scheduled loop on a Blue Bus during Late Nite service from 12:30 A.M. (Fridays) or 12:45 A.M. to 3:30 A.M..

Notes:

On weekdays, the Campus Shuttle starts its loops from the Engineering Building stop (except for the scheduled times at 10:10 P.M., 10:35 P.M., and 11:30 P.M. when it starts from Mohawk).


On weekends, the Campus Shuttle starts its singular loop from the Mohawk stop.


Scroll below for a graphic map of this route, its schedule, and its stops with links to stop pictures and Google Maps location pins so that you can easily find your stop, and know when your bus is expected to arrive.

① Leaves Mohawk

② Susquehanna

③ Hillside

④ Mountainview

⑤ Returns to Lower Campus


The Campus Shuttle runs in continuous loops on a Green Shuttle from 7:00 A.M. to 9:40 P.M.. After, the Campus Shuttle will operate in a Blue Bus performing singular, non-continuous scheduled loops beginning from the Mohawk stop at 10:10 P.M, 10:35 P.M., and 11:30 P.M..


To see where the Campus Shuttle is please visit ETA SPOT's Website or download the ETA SPOT app from your App Store, and select the Campus Shuttle.
